page.topic: Removing the Table of Contents, Bookmarks, or Index

description.p: If a report contains a table of contents, bookmarks, or index, one or all of these items can be removed quickly using the built-in tools in the report builder.

discussion.p: The table of contents, bookmarks, or index for a report can be removed using the *[ui:Clear TOC/Bookmark/Index]* tool in the *[ui:Report]* menu for the report builder.

description.p: Clicking on *[ui:Clear TOC/Bookmark/Index]* opens the *[ui:Remove TOC/Bookmark/Index]* dialog. This window displays what sections are currently included in the report.

To delete a section, uncheck the checkbox for the section you want to remove. This will delete the section from the report. For example, in the image above, unchecking *[ui:Has Index]* will delete the index from the report.

If the report does not contain bookmarks, a table of contents, or an index, the checkbox for the section will be disabled. If none of these sections are in the report, you will be shown a message that there are no bookmarks, table of contents, or index entries in the report.

figure.title: Nothing Defined: There are no bookmarks, table of contents or index entries defined.

page.limitations: Freeform and Layout Table Reports Only
